text: "Rock with You" is a classic song by American singer Michael Jackson, featured on his album Off the Wall, released in 1979. The track showcases Jackson's signature style, blending disco, soul, and pop elements. Its smooth melody and romantic lyrics emphasize intimacy and connection. The song was a commercial success, reaching the top of the charts and solidifying Jackson's status as a major pop icon. == Music video == A music video was released for the song, using the shorter single version. It features Michael in a sparkly sequined suit singing the song with a bright laser behind him. The video was directed by Bruce Gowers and filmed in 1979 at the 800 Stage in Los Angeles, California.
title: Rock with You
